title: Urban Square: Kohaku no Tsuigeki
synopsis: Ryou Matsumoto is a screenplay writer that runs into a man and witnesses his murder. Unknown to him, he gets caught up in an illegal antique ring along with a girl he meets named Yuki. In order to survive, he ends up acting out the "action hero" role that he writes in his screenplays.
voices: ['Yamada, Eiko', 'Inoue, Kazuhiko', 'Tanaka, Nobuo', 'Iizuka, Shouzou', 'Inoue, Makio', 'Hiramatsu, Akiko', 'Chiba, Shigeru']
staff: [['Nishimori, Akira', ['Director']], ['Takada, Akemi', ['Character Design']], ['Ito, Kazunori', ['Screenplay']], ['Nishizawa, Susumu', ['Key Animation']]]
